overview:
Simantini is the co-founder and CEO of eXacly.me. She has nearly 15 years of experience in product innovation, analytics, business strategy, marketing and partnerships, as well as social media. She has worked with many consumer Internet startups and emerging technology companies. Simantini has an MBA from Olin School of Business, Washington University in St. Louis, and a further specialization from Wharton, University of Pennsylvania.

Simantini has traveled to more than 45 countries, is an avid landscape photographer, loves listening to music and pursuing outdoor adventures.
